name: Mortal Compass
description:
Description:

  • You’re a reaper and you’re loosing lifeforce, so you must take it from the mortals of the realm of the living. But there is a catch, your life drains quicker from manifesting yourself in their reality - so you must use your compass to trace them (while in the realm of the dead) before crossing over and smiting them to gain more health.
  • The compass is that red arrow that appears around you in the dead realm.
  • Beware, mortals who you steal life force from will haunt you in the realm of the dead, so watch out.
  • If the web player is laggy, download the .exe.

Controls:

  • Space to switch realms
  • Left click to smite
  • Escape to pause

Bugs:

  • Sometimes humans won't spawn for a game: this is fixed by pausing, exiting to the main menu and starting the game again; or restarting the program.
